name: df-locfin
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(clocfin, cmpt(s0, ctop, cab(s1, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s1))), wral(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(crab(s4, cv(s1), wne(cin(cv(s4), cv(s3)), emptycls)), cfn))))))))
comment: Define "locally finite." (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
